text:
Hi Everyone,
I want to use the HubSpot analytics API and fetch the data ,so now is there any possibility we can write the code inside HubSpot and store it to SQL ?.
Or I need to make the API calls in external application and store data?
Any suggestions / help will be glad to continue the work am doing.I dont have exposure to the API Calls in HubSpot.
Re: "the CRM API currently only supports retrieving quotes that have been created by a HubSpot user in a HubSpot account via an API key". How did you determine this limitation?
